import React from "react"; import logo from "./img/agency-hab-logo-50.png"; function GeneratedSignature({ fullName, jobTitle, phoneNumber, emailAddress, address, color, // Add this prop }) { return (
{/* Top Left Quadrant: Logo */} {/* Top Right Quadrant: Social Media Icons */} {/* Bottom Left Quadrant: Personal Info */}
{/* Align them in a row */}

{phoneNumber} | {emailAddress}

{fullName}

{jobTitle}

); } export default GeneratedSignature;
